title: What can I do if my Y536A1 phone runs slowly?
answer:
l   On the **Phone Manager** screen, touch **Scan**, and follow the onscreen instructions to optimize your phone.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141024001124590001.png)

l   On the **Phone Manager** screen, touch **Phone accelerator**, and follow the onscreen instructions to close applications not in use.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141024001125950002.png)

l   On the **Phone Manager** screen, touch **Storage cleaner** > **Smart scan**, and follow the onscreen instructions to clean your phone storage.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141024001126544003.png)

l   Restart your phone.

If the problem persists, back up important data and restore your phone to its factory settings.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141024001126887004.png)

                                       The figures are for your
reference only. The actual screens may vary.
